name: Stormy Flap 2
description:
Description:
Game made to the semcomp 21 jam 2018.
Fly between planes to get the star before the storm comes.
Collision with the planes will change your color and make the 
clouds aprouch faster, getting the stars will reverse the clouds
movement. To win the game make the clouds disapear from the screen.
Careful with the volume, since the sound is home-made with
whatever was close at the time.

controls: 
arrows: move your woodpecker around.
space: make a woodpecker like noise.
mouse: click buttons.

Made by: 

Luca G. Urssi

Sérgio Ricardo Gomes B. Filho

Lucas Noriyuki Yoshida
